title: International Financial Institution Funds and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance (State Guarantees, International
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance (State Guarantees, International 
Institution Funds and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 

Financial 
(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance (state guarantee international institution fund miscellaneous provisions) act 2024 financial (commencement) order 2024

title: International Financial Institution Funds and Miscellaneous Provisions) Act
heading: 2. The 28th day of February 2024 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 28th day of February 2024 is appointed as the day on which the 
Finance (State Guarantees, International Financial Institution Funds and 
Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2024 (No. 3 of 2024) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 February, 2024. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 1st March, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [69] 3
